## msFrames variable

Returns number of samples for given millisecond period and samle rate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
msFrames: (t: number, fs: number) => number
```

## Example


```ts
// samples per 20 ms @ 44.1kHz
msFrames(20, 44100)
// 882

```
